dict.acceptation: 维持；支撑，支持；遭受，忍受；供养；

sent.orig: They play the game at a very high level and they sustain that level.
sent.trans: 他们打出了水平很高的比赛，并且他们始终保持着良好的竞技状态。

sent.orig: The branches could hardly sustain the weight of fruit.
sent.trans: 树枝已很难支撑水果的重量。

sent.orig: At every stage of life we sustain losses -- and grow in the process.
sent.trans: 在人生的每一阶段我们都会有所失--并在此过程中成长。

sent.orig: Patience helps sustain healthy relationships with family, friends, even coworkers.
sent.trans: 忍耐（忍让）助于家庭，朋友甚至同事维系良好的人际关系。

sent.orig: It needs continuing liquidity inflows to sustain it.
sent.trans: 它需要持续不断的流动性流入作为支撑。
